name: Sinking Ship Chef
description:
Made for the WGJ 120, theme is "What a Mess!", and we went with a mess hall.
Mostly done!

Controls:

WASD for moving
Space for interaction
X for picking up or dropping items
TAB to cycle interaction targets

Rules: 

Try to make salads for your crew before the submarine sinks!
(Plug holes with produce to reduce water intake, deliver salad plates to Passthrough)

Credits:
Code, Gameplay, Scripting: Cactii, NickKeys
Modeling: BiggBenn
Music: jamesallenmusic
